DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether old adult ( age 65-89 ) consume dietary supplement Juven ( Abbott Laboratories ) versus placebo 6 month demonstrate increase fat-free mass , muscle volume , physical function .
DOC.criteria: Ages 6589 Ambulatory Cognitive impairment History renal hepatic disease History hypotension History peripheral artery disease Uncontrolled hypertension Uncontrolled diabetes Selfreported claustrophobia Current smoker Steroid androgen use previous 3 month Individuals pacemaker defibrillator
